lines: 1. La Yingisaka A Huwelele, Evhangeli Yi Twala Misaveni,
A Huwelele Xikarhi Ka Vanhu, La Swi Rhandzaka A Te.
La Swirhandzaka A Huwelele, Vhangeli Tintshaveni,
Tatana U Vitana Mutsendzeleki, La Swirhandzaka A Te.
2. La Taka A Nga Tshuki A Hlwela, Nyangwa Yi Pfuriwile Nghena Sweswi,
Ndlela Ya Ntiyiso, I Yesu Ntsena, La Swirhandzaka A Te.
3. La Rhandzaka Tiya Xitshembiswen, La Swi Rhandzaka U Ta Tiyisela,
La Swi Rhandzaka U Kuma Vutomi, La Swirhandzaka A Te.
